% Header/footer
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[R]{\color{gray}Matthew Bain}
\fancyfoot[R]{\color{gray}\thepage {} / \pageref{LastPage}}
\fancyfoot[L]{
  \color{gray}Built with 
  \myhref{https://bainmatt.github.io/autocv/}{autocv}, 
  an R package by Matthew Bain
}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0pt}
\setlength{\headheight}{14pt}

% Remove page numbers
% - \pagenumbering{gobble}

% Header padding
\usepackage{titlesec}
% \titlespacing{\section}{0pt}{12pt plus 4pt minus 3pt}{4pt plus 2pt minus 2pt}
% \titlespacing{\subsection}{0pt}{12pt plus 4pt minus 3pt}{4pt plus 2pt minus 2pt}

% Bullets alignment/padding
\usepackage{enumitem}
\setlist{left=0pt, topsep=-4pt}

% Set font (Helvetica Neue, Avenir, Gill Sans)
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont{Helvetica Neue}

% Custom text colours
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{myblue}{RGB}{0, 76, 153}
% \definecolor{mylinkblue}{RGB}{36, 86, 129}
\definecolor{mygreen}{RGB}{0, 115, 76}

% Ensure text is left aligned
\raggedright

% Custom macros ----------------------------------------------------------------

% Custom hyperlink formatting
\usepackage[normalem]{ulem}
\newcommand{\myhref}[2]{\href{#1}{\textcolor{blue}{\uline{#2}}}}

% Custom width-spanning horizontal rules
\newcommand{\mysectionrule}{%
  \color{black}
  \leaders\hbox{\rule[0.5ex]{0.5pt}{0.4pt}}\hfill
}

% Custom title
% Arg1 : font size, Arg2 : text
\newcommand{\myname}[2][16pt]{%
  \textbf{\fontsize{#1}{#1}\selectfont\color{myblue}{#2}} \hfill
}

% TODO: ?put each of the custom paddings into variables and auto-populate in R

% Custom subtitle (within level 2 markdown header environment)
\newcommand{\myrole}[1]{\vspace{-10pt}\color{myblue}{#1}}

% Custom section headers (within level 2 markdown header environment)
\newcommand{\mysection}[1]{\vspace{-6pt}\color{mygreen}{#1}}

% Custom bio block
\newcommand{\mybio}[1]{%
  \vspace{10pt}
  \hrule
  \vspace{2pt}
  #1
  \vspace{8pt}
  \hrule
  \vspace{2pt}
}
